content: Several items drove our gross payments volume for the quarter, particularly strong performance by those merchants on Shopify Payments and increasing percentage of which are Shopify Plus, new merchant adoption across the globe, expanded penetration in Shop Pay and the increased footprint of our point-of-sale hardware in brick and mortar stores.
